text: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs is a ministry of the United Arab Emirates, headquartered in Al Bateen, Abu Dhabi. This is a list of foreign ministers of the United Arab Emirates. *1971–1980: Ahmed Bin Khalifa Al Suwaidi *1980–2006: Rashid Abdullah Al Nuaimi *2006–present: Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahyan ==References== ==Sources== *Rulers.org – Foreign ministers S–Z ==External links== * Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation Foreign Foreign Ministers Politicians *
title: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation (United Arab Emirates)
